meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ron Tropsic Penny DeMille Michael Backus Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #191.

td.p: Ron Tropsic, a marketing representative originally from Chicago, Illinois
Penny DeMille, a homemaker originally from Dayton, Ohio
Michael Backus, a puzzle designer originally from Tucson, Arizona (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,700)

tr.td: U.S. STATES
PRISON SONGS
FAIRY TALES
POLITICAL QUOTES
PLAYWRIGHTS
USED-UP CARS

')
